Title: Wicked City
Writer: Hideyuki Kikuchi, Yoshiaki Kawajiri, Norio Osada
Actors: Yûsaku Yara, Toshiko Fujita, Ichirô Nagai
Plot: While protecting a signatory to a peace treaty between their peoples, a male human and a female demon discover that their mutual attraction may be the key to unifying their worlds.
